column5: Last year I was at Lake Kipiwa the end of august and the fishing was slow. This year we plan on going the last week in june, hoping the fishing will be better. Any information on the difference between June and August would be greatly appreciated. thanks in advance.

Hi Doug;Personally I prefer late August. It seems the 'eyes are starting to gorge for the winter plus you don't have the bugs to battle. I go up in the Spring anyway just for the joy of fishing. I didn't go up last year and probably just as well from what I heard due to the weather but planning on at least 2 trips this year and probably up to Laverdrye park.Good luck,Al
